CustomField.description: When using the 'breakdown' UI component that aggregates code data by grouping, you can opt to hide rows where no records are found. For example, historical data that is less important than the other codes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When using the 'breakdown' UI component that aggregates code data by grouping, you can opt to hide rows where no records are found. For example, historical data that is less important than the other codes.
CustomField.label: Hide in breakdown list if empty
